Class BreakdownDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • sloca.model.BreakdownDAO

  • public class BreakdownDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    to process the break down of the data by according to different condition(s)

      • breakdownByOne

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> breakdownByOne(java.lang.String timeStart,
                                                   java.lang.String time,
                                                   java.lang.String name)
        to break down the data by using one condition
        Parameters:
        timeStart - the start time to retrieve the data
        time - the end time to retrieve the data
        name - is the name of the break down condition
        Returns:
        String ArrayList of the list of data, which contains the condition and the count number

      • breakdownByTwo

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> breakdownByTwo(java.lang.String timeStart,
                                                   java.lang.String time,
                                                   java.lang.String name1,
                                                   java.lang.String name2)
        to break down the data by using two conditions
        Parameters:
        timeStart - the start time to retrieve the data
        time - the end time to retrieve the data
        name1 - is the name of the first break down condition
        name2 - is the name of the second break down condition
        Returns:
        String ArrayList of the list of data, which contains the conditions and their corresponding count number

      • breakdownByThree

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> breakdownByThree(java.lang.String timeStart,

        Parameters:
        timeStart - the start time to retrieve the data
        time - the end time to retrieve the data
        name1 - is the name of the first break down condition
        name2 - is the name of the second break down condition
        name3 - is the name of the third break down condition
        Returns:
        String ArrayList of the list of data, which contains the conditions and their corresponding count number
